column1: #Text=Trump is a misogynist, racist buffoon and perhaps worse.
#Text=Clinton is, to put it in the most polite terms possible, ethically challenged and craven in what she will tolerate in her lust for power.
#Text=Neither of them is a stellar representative of their gender.
#Text=Next time, put up a female candidate who outshines the male, not one who has sunk to his same level.
